entry.title: Replying to @pickingpoppies68 it's hard because our neurodivergency is a core part of who we are and how we process. For me, I still feel like I have ADHD when I'm on the meds, but I also feel so much clearer and able to access more of my mind. I hope th
entry.content: Replying to @pickingpoppies68 it's hard because our neurodivergency is a core part of who we are and how we process. For me, I still feel like I have ADHD when I'm on the meds, but I also feel so much clearer and able to access more of my mind. I hope this analogy helps, it's the image I get whenever I try and think about what it feels like. #adhd #adhdmeds #nd #audhd #neurodiverse #adhdtiktok

entry.title: Replying to @fattymgatty this is a great question thank you! it's important to know that not all trans people experience gender dysphoria, but I think most people - including cis folks - experience gender euphoria. #trans #genderquestioning #lgbt #dysph
entry.content: Replying to @fattymgatty this is a great question thank you! it's important to know that not all trans people experience gender dysphoria, but I think most people - including cis folks - experience gender euphoria. #trans #genderquestioning #lgbt #dysphoria

entry.title: I didn't believe I had ADHD. and then even when I did believe it, I minimised the impact it has on my life. starting medication has meant I'm confronted with the stark contrast of what it feels like to think clearly and then have it taken away. I gaslit
entry.content: I didn't believe I had ADHD. and then even when I did believe it, I minimised the impact it has on my life. starting medication has meant I'm confronted with the stark contrast of what it feels like to think clearly and then have it taken away. I gaslit myself for so many years üò• #adhd #adhdtiktok #medication #audhd #adhdmeds #nd

entry.title: #stitch with @VATTICA we are more similar than we are different! height, body hair, genital configuration, hormone levels etc - none of these are binary and they are all part of what we categorize as "sex" - so how can we claim sex is binary? we have att
entry.content: #stitch with @VATTICA we are more similar than we are different! height, body hair, genital configuration, hormone levels etc - none of these are binary and they are all part of what we categorize as "sex" - so how can we claim sex is binary? we have attempted to classify natural human variation down to two boxes and they don't always fit. #sex #gender #intersex #trans #nonbinary

entry.title: Replying to @user9038310355074 this comment from a midwife is genuinely shocking. when someone has recently given birth they are deserving of respect and compassion. not to mention "mum" isn't a biological term. and if you truly understood science and bio
entry.content: Replying to @user9038310355074 this comment from a midwife is genuinely shocking. when someone has recently given birth they are deserving of respect and compassion. not to mention "mum" isn't a biological term. and if you truly understood science and biology, you'd know that trans people exist. #trans #lgbt #transpregnancy #midwifery #midwife #postnataldepression #pnd

entry.title: #stitch with @Arctic Harmacist let's keep these conversations going and flip the narrative so Autism and ADHD are understood from within and not without. my understanding of what it means to be neurodivergent has completely changed thanks to community an
entry.content: #stitch with @Arctic Harmacist let's keep these conversations going and flip the narrative so Autism and ADHD are understood from within and not without. my understanding of what it means to be neurodivergent has completely changed thanks to community and social media. I am working in my internalised ableism which makes me want to mask at my own expense and allowing myself to be inconvenient. #actuallyautistic #audhd #adhd #neurospicy #neurospicycrew #queer #lgbt #trans #inconvenient
